section.name: Downloads
section.p: The following releases are available for download:
Nightly source drops can be obtained here.
The latest Gump generated binary can be obtained here.
The CVS repository for HttpClient can be browsed online.
The best way to get HttpClient, is to checkout the souce from our public CVS server.

If you are using Maven for your project, you can create a dependancy in your project.xml with the following block:
<dependency> <id>commons-httpclient</id> <version>2.0-alpha3</version> <url>http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/httpclient/</url> </dependency>
There are also other jar versions available. You can check HttpClient on ibiblio for exactly what is available.
